section.title: How to Be a Successful Math Student
section.p: What makes someone a good math student? Being smart? Not always... Being a hard worker? Work ethic defintiely helps! How do you study? How do you learn? Before going too far towards your degree in mathematics, maybe we should think about good strategies to be successful. Let's take a little time to think about how to be a successful student.

statement.p: Think about your past experiences in mathematics courses. When were you most successful? What practices helped you be successful?

section.p: Now let's start thinking about others.

statement.p: Think about someone that you know that is good at mathematics. List five qualities that makes this person good at math.
What kind of actions can we take to develop these qualities?

solution.p: Answers will vary, but a desire to understand will motivate development of these qualities.
